content: whip up a quick and easy holiday gift with this pattern for the basketweave knitted mug cozy pair with some coffee and a mug and you re good to go i wanted this project to work up quickly so i knew i wanted a chunky or super bulky yarn i have a lot of color made easy in my stash and i m trying to use that stash up before the new year so i decided it was a match made in heaven the pattern for the basketweave knitted mug cozy is super simple it s just a combination of knit and purls with two stitches on each side as a garter stitch border you will work this pattern flat and work two tiny seams at the end using any seaming method you wish
